creator: Grzegorz Klimczewski

license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Akronim is a brand-new, original, brush like, stylish font with a Western and Central European (e.g. Polish, Croatian, Czech, Magyar etc.) Latin character set. Handmade in Poland, Europe, by Grzegorz Klimczewski. An acronym (in Polish, "akronim") is an abbreviation that forms a word. So this story is cut short. To understand it, imagine a nice girl with beautifully plaited slavic hair, strolling among the fields of wheat. If you imagine this, you will find a good use for this tasteful, brand-new typeface.
